page.title: 02Golden Valley
page.content: Golden Valley is a small valley near our school. It is used for all different kinds of purposes such as growing crops like barley and hay.Also there are one or two barns. One of these barns has a statuette showing two men with letters M and J on their hats. Above them was a phrase saying "We Wish You Health" and a date 2nd July 1977 which we are going to research. Across the valley there is a 50cm diameter industrial gas pipeline through Avon to Dorset and Devon. Most of the valley is used for barley growing, hay making and pastural land for cattle grazing and a few acres are what used to be a tip which is now being filled in. { }Authors{Stephen Leworthy, Kelley {Taylor, Rachel Johnson.}Researchers {Leanda Pullin, Sarah Milford. S.B.L.
